mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_QUARTZ_JOB (ID, BEAN_NAME, CRON_EXPRESSION, IS_PAUSE, JOB_NAME, METHOD_NAME, PARAMS, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_USER) select #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.beanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cronExpression,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isPause,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual

mapper.update: UPDATE SYS_QUARTZ_JOB SET BEAN_NAME = #{beanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRON_EXPRESSION = #{cronExpression,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_PAUSE = #{isPause,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, JOB_NAME = #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, METHOD_NAME = #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAMS = #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
